detaileddescription.para:
This configuration sets up RRAMC with the following options:
Write mode disabled
Preload timeout value: 0x80
Write to the RRAM on the next timeout enabled
Access timeout: 0x100
Write operation is to be aborted on the power failure

parameterdescription.para: Size of write buffer.
RRAMC event.

briefdescription.para: Function for erasing the whole RRAM memory.

simplesect.para: All user code and UICR will be erased.

briefdescription.para: Function for writing a single byte to RRAM.

detaileddescription.para: To determine if the last RRAM write operation has been completed, use nrfx_rramc_ready_check(). The status is not updated during writes to write-buffer.

simplesect.para: Depending on the source of the code being executed, the CPU may be halted during the operation. Refer to the Product Specification for more information.

parameterdescription.para: Address to where data is to be written.
Value to be written.

briefdescription.para: Function for writing consecutive bytes to RRAM.

detaileddescription.para: To determine if the last RRAM write operation has been completed, use nrfx_rramc_ready_check(). The status is not updated during writes to write-buffer.

simplesect.para: Depending on the source of the code being executed, the CPU may be halted during the operation. Refer to the Product Specification for more information.

parameterdescription.para: Address to where data is to be written.
Pointer to data to be copied.
Number of bytes to be written.

briefdescription.para: Function for writing a 32-bit word to RRAM.

detaileddescription.para: To determine if the last RRAM write operation has been completed, use nrfx_rramc_ready_check(). The status is not updated during writes to write-buffer.

simplesect.para: Depending on the source of the code being executed, the CPU may be halted during the operation. Refer to the Product Specification for more information.

parameterdescription.para: Address to where data is to be written. Must be word-aligned.
Value to be written.

briefdescription.para: Function for writing consecutive 32-bit words to RRAM.

detaileddescription.para: To determine if the last RRAM write operation has been completed, use nrfx_rramc_ready_check(). The status is not updated during writes to write-buffer.

simplesect.para: Depending on the source of the code being executed, the CPU may be halted during the operation. Refer to the Product Specification for more information.

parameterdescription.para: Address to where data is to be written. Must be word-aligned.
Pointer to data to be copied. Must be word-aligned.
Number of words to be written.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling write mode and setting size of write buffer.

parameterdescription.para: True if write mode is to be enabled, false otherwise.
Size of write buffer. If set to 0, buffering is disabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if write mode is enabled.

simplesect.para: True if write mode is enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the RRAMC driver instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure containing configuration.
Event handler provided by the user.
Initialization was successful.
The driver has already been initialized.

briefdescription.para: Function for reconfiguring the RRAMC driver instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure containing configuration.
Reconfiguration was successful.
The driver is uninitialized.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the RRAMC driver instance.
Function for getting the total RRAM size in bytes.

simplesect.para: The function will return FICR_INFO_RRAM_RRAM_Unspecified value if the total RRAM size cannot be determined based on the FICR data.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading a word from the OTP in UICR.

detaileddescription.para: OTP is a region of the UICR present in some chips. This function must be used to read word data from this region since unaligned accesses are not available on the OTP RRAM area.

parameterdescription.para: Address (index) in OTP table from which a word is to be read.
contents at index.

briefdescription.para: Function for writing a 32-bit word at index position to OTP region in UICR.

detaileddescription.para: The OTP is only able to write '0' to bits in the UICR that are erased (set to '1'). It cannot rewrite a bit back to '1'. This function checks if the value currently residing at the specified index can be transformed to the desired value without any '0' to '1' transitions. If yes, then perform the write operation.

parameterdescription.para: Address (index) in OTP table to which a word it to be written.
Value to be written.
Word can be written into the specified OTP index address.
Word cannot be written into the specified OTP index address. Erase UICR or change index address.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading a byte from the RRAM.

detaileddescription.para: Use this function in case accessing the RRAM gives the possibility to run the code in an environment where the flash is simulated.

parameterdescription.para: Address of the byte to be read.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading a 32-bit word from the RRAM.

detaileddescription.para: Use this function in case accessing the RRAM gives the possibility to run the code in an environment where the flash is simulated.

parameterdescription.para: Address of the word to be read.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading a given number of bytes from the RRAM into the specified buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the buffer to store the data.
Address of the first byte to be read.
Number of bytes to be read.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking current RRAMC operation status.

detaileddescription.para: The status is updated for all RRAMC operations except during read and writes to write-buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Current operation is completed, and RRAMC is ready.
RRAMC is busy.
